title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of units sold, with a total of 16 data points.
Overall Number of units sold has increased over the Year.

Number of units sold is roughly constant from 2003 to 2004, slightly decreasing from 2004 to 2006, gradually increasing from 2006 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Number of units sold about 560415.0 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Number of units sold about 313437.0 was recorded at Year 2007
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of units sold, with a total of 16 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2007 to 2011.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2003 to 2007.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2013 to 2016.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2013.
